articles.title: Gavaskar, Ganguly, Pathan divided on Chahal's snub from India's Asia Cup squad - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Yuzvendra Chahal's absence from India's Asia Cup squad was the most talked about thing among many. Sunil Gavaskar, Sourav Ganguly, Irfan Pathan had their say. | Cricket
articles.content: The BCCI on Monday announced a 17-member squad for the upcoming Asia Cup, which gets underway next week in Pakistan and Sri Lanka. The announcement was done in the presence of India skipper Rohit Sha… [+2488 chars]
